Source.Name: abi-wizard
Source.Summary: Tool for generating ABI reports for libraries and binaries.
Source.Description: As a package maintainer, it's a challenging task to keep track of binary dependencies and ABI changes. This tool generates reports that can be used to inform maintainers of ABI and dependency changes.

Package.Name: abi-wizard
Package.Summary: Tool for generating ABI reports for libraries and binaries.
Package.Description: As a package maintainer, it's a challenging task to keep track of binary dependencies and ABI changes. This tool generates reports that can be used to inform maintainers of ABI and dependency changes.
